verses.1: Pasian aw, ka kikona aw hong za inla, ka thungetna hong ngai in.
verses.2: Ka lungsim a neu ciangin, leimong panin nang kong sam hi. Keimah sangin a sang zaw suangpi tungah hong paipih in.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh nang, keima bukna na hi a, galte始 langah tausang muanhuai na hi hi.
verses.4: Na buk sungah hong omsak tawntung inla, nangma khate始 hutna sungah lungmuangin hong omsak in.
verses.5: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian aw, ka thuciamnate khempeuh nangmah in na za khin a, nangmah a hong zahtak mite始 ngah dingte keimah nong pia khinta hi.
verses.6: Kumpipa khantosak inla, khang tawntungin nungtasak in.
verses.7: Pasian始 mai ah amah om ngitnget henla, ama itna kip le a thumanna in amah kem tahen.
verses.8: Tua ciangin nisimin ka thuciamnate bangin gamta-in, na minphatna ka sasa ding hi.
